name: GenericValidator_matchRegexpTest
description: Unit tests for the matchRegexp method in GenericValidator.

test_cases.name: testMatchRegexp_NullRegexp
test_cases.description: Tests the matchRegexp method with a null regular expression.

test_cases.name: testMatchRegexp_EmptyRegexp
test_cases.description: Tests the matchRegexp method with an empty regular expression.

test_cases.name: testMatchRegexp_ValidMatch
test_cases.description: Tests the matchRegexp method with a valid match.

test_cases.name: testMatchRegexp_InvalidMatch
test_cases.description: Tests the matchRegexp method with an invalid match.
